author: Lori Rozsa
title: Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis looks to open the state to business again - Washington Post
description: DeSantis appointed a committee that includes Disney executives to help reopen the state.
content: DeSantiss move comes as President Trump last week unveiled broad guidelines for states to follow as they begin reopening. The plan leaves specifics to governors, who first must show that cases of coronavirus are decreasing. Governors in states including Georg… [+4313 chars]
